description.p:
This addon implements the opened platform called Open Toutatice (which one is based on the Nuxeo DM distribution)
Main features : * Integration with nuxeo 6.0 * new bootstrap views for portal integration and from tinyMCE (insert a picture, insert a link). * new fragment : criteria list, slider * configuration objects can now be global (setted on a repository) or local to a domain * workspaces have now a tab order and a navigation visual * new operation FetchExtendedInfos : split of fetch operation for structural and optionnal publication informations
